chart_description: This chart represents the rate at which IPv6 Multicast Listener Discovery Version 2 (MLDv2) reports are sent and received on the network. MLDv2 allows nodes to efficiently track multicast group membership, enabling efficient delivery of multicast traffic.

dimension_descriptions.InMLDv2Reports: This dimension represents the rate at which MLDv2 reports are received by the node. It indicates the level of interest in multicast group membership on the network.
dimension_descriptions.OutMLDv2Reports: This dimension represents the rate at which MLDv2 reports are sent by the node. It indicates the level of multicasting activity on the network.
